slides.title: Stay Updated
slides.content:
**Track Last 6-12 Months:**
- National & International events
- Government schemes & policies
- Sports achievements
- Awards (Bharat Ratna, Padma, Nobel)
- New appointments (Ministers, Governors)
- Defense developments
- Important days and events

slides.title: Government Schemes
slides.content:
**Major Schemes:**
- PM Awas Yojana (Housing)
- Ayushman Bharat (Healthcare)
- Digital India (Technology)
- Make in India (Manufacturing)
- Skill India (Training)
- Swachh Bharat (Cleanliness)
- Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (Farmers)

slides.title: Sports & Defense
slides.content:
**Sports:**
- Olympics, Cricket World Cup, Asian Games
- Indian achievements in sports

**Defense:**
- Indigenous weapons development
- Naval exercises
- Army modernization
- Make in India for defense

**Space:** ISRO missions (Chandrayaan, Gaganyaan, Aditya)

question.questionText: Which scheme provides health insurance to poor families?
question.explanation: Ayushman Bharat is the government's flagship health insurance scheme providing coverage to economically vulnerable families.
